constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 133 (Thursday, July 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. LOIS FRANKEL of Florida:
H.R. 4814.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I
[Page H4294]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

title: To obtain and direct the placement in the Capitol or on the Capitol Grounds of a statue to honor Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States Sandra Day O'Connor and a statue to honor Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States Ruth Bader Ginsburg.
